XmlBonusFileListInterface Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for XmlBonusFileListInterface:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class used to store the path to all BonusFile

A BonusFile entry is defined by its name. This name should be unique. Its filename and a description are alse stored in this list.

See also:
XmlBonusFileInterface

XmlBonusFileListInterface::getBonusFileName ( $  bonusFileNode  ) 

Get the name of a BonusFile xml node

The good way to use this function is to get the player xml node first (by a call to getPlayerByName) and call this with the returned player.

Parameters:
$bonusFileNode The BonusFile XML node
Returns:
The player name or "" if the given player does not exist

XmlBonusFileListInterface::isBonusFileExists ( $  name  )

XmlBonusFileListInterface::isBonusFileNameExists ( $  filename  ) 

Is this BonusFile filename already in use

It is used to prevent the same BonusFile twice in the list.

Parameters:
$filename The filename to test
Returns:
true if this BonusFile filename is in the list, otherwise false
